Text.Page:
After the storm hit, the weather got even worse. Don't listen when people tell you it's a nice dayâ€”they're putting on a good face. Fighting the undead is one thing, but doing it in freezing temperatures is another.

If you've got any fight left in you, we'd sure appreciate someone eliminating the {@LinkCreature:31#6#deathfrost chargers}. If you bring back their bones as proof, I'd even reward you.

Looks like you've got plenty of kick in you still! Good work!

This won't fix everything, but it's certainly a start.
We can't rebuild with those {@LinkCreature:31#6#deathfrost chargers} hunting us.
